question:
Which of the following statements are correct regarding Voter-verified paper audit trail (VVPAT)?
1. It is a paper-based record.
2. It is a computer memory-based record.
3. It is also known as verified paper record (VPR).
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Voter-verified paper audit trail (VVPAT) is a paper-based record. It is not a computer memory-based record. It is readable by the human eye and allows the voters to interpret their vote directly. It is also known as verified paper record (VPR).
